name: Duck Hunt (Nythen)
description:
There's a plague of cute ducks, someone needs to stop them! 
Get points shooting these cuties to achieve the top of your highscore table, you can only miss 5 times!

No ducks were harmed in the making of this minigame.

This minigame was started as an exercice from a Master degree  and was developed using C# and Unity. 

Music is provided by Jorge Gandara!
